alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 08 at 4:13AM EDT until April 08 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch, sleet accumulations of around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Somerset, Northwest Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis and Central Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EDT today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
